assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en:
Youth counselling  - basic knowledge of the theory and practice of counselling and youth counselling, youth counsellor skills
Information service - European Youth Information Charter, ERYCA
description.et:
Noorte nõustamine - nõustamise põhialused ja teooriad, nõustaja oskused, esmanõustamine 
Noorte infoteenus - Euroopa Noorteinfo Harta, ERYCA

objectives.en: The purpose: To develop youth counselling skills and improve the skills necessary for implementing the principles of the European Youth Information Charter.
objectives.et: Arendada noorte nõustamisoskuseid ning edendada oskuseid tööks Euroopa Noorteinfo Harta põhimõtete ellurakendamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: - has basic knowledge of the theory and practice of counselling and youth counselling;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab alusteadmisi nõustamise ja noortenõustamise teooriast ja praktikast;

learning_outcomes.en: - is aware of the contents of youth counselling and information service processes, their specifics and practical techniques;
learning_outcomes.et: - on teadlik noortenõustamise ja infoteenuse protsessi sisust, selle spetsiifikast ja praktilisest tehnikast;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the European Youth Information Charter, and the principles of the service standard and ERYCA;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab Euroopa Noorteinfo Hartat, teenusstandardi ja ERYCA põhimõtteid;

learning_outcomes.en: - can survey the information needs of young people;
- has practical experience in the counselling process;
- can give an overview of the activities of a youth counsellor and information specialist.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab anda ülevaadet noortenõustaja ja infospetsialisti tegevustest.
